button.label: Submit to Plotter
button.vc: if pkpick<>'' then exec(pkpick) page endif

label.label: Add Selected Plots to a Plot File

button.label: Re-Transform 2D
button.vc: if arraydim>2.0*ni then wft2da(1) else wft2da endif

button.label: Re-Transform 2D
button.vc: if arraydim>2.0*ni2 then wft2da('ni2',1) else wft2da('ni2') endif

group.label: 3D Planes
group.show: if (ni>1 and ni2>1) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=0 endif
